caculateCenter

public static Point2D caculateCenter(edu.uci.ics.jung.algorithms.layout.Layout<Vertex,Edge> layout,
                                     edu.uci.ics.jung.graph.Graph<Vertex,Edge> graph)
Calculates the center of masses of a network given its layout and as if the nodes had constant weight.

Parameters:
layout - positions of the nodes of the networks
graph - network to analyze
Returns:
Point2D with the coordinates of the center

Creates a local version of a file contained in the jar

ensureDecimal

public static String ensureDecimal(double num)
Ensures that the string representaton of the number is not exponential. 5 digits before "."

Parameters:
num -
Returns:
String with a decimal notation of the number

Erases the multiple edges of a graph

Parameters:

checkForDuplicatedVertexIds

public static boolean checkForDuplicatedVertexIds(BrowsableNetwork network)
This method checks if there are duplicated vertices with the same ID. If there are duplicated IDs then we cannot save the network before reassigning unique IDs

Returns:
true if there are duplicated IDs, false otherwise.

reassignVertexIds

public static void reassignVertexIds(BrowsableNetwork network)
This method assigns unique IDs to vertices.
